subject: Re: [junit] Re: How does Unit test in a heirarchy works...
msgSnippet: ... I don t understand why a hierarchical design requires that the *test classes* be hierarchically organised. -- Chris electric hedgehog Dollin
messageBody:
On Monday 18 April 2005 13:42, Arun J wrote:

> I mentioned my design has a heirarchical structure and would like to
> have my tests also have a heirarchical structure for testing this
> behavior easily.

I don't understand why a hierarchical design requires that the *test
classes* be hierarchically organised.

--
Chris "electric hedgehog" Dollin
